DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and tolerability of AGN-199201 for the treatment of erythema associated with rosacea.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of AGN-199201 in Patients With Erythema Associated With Rosacea
DOC.criteria: facial erythema associated with rosacea on both sides of the face Laser lightsource or other energy based therapy in the last 6 months Excessive hair around the treatment area
